sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules"> <x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection/> <condition>current.type == "push"</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Update changes on local push delete</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[//There can only be 1 push going on at a time, so all queued local changes //for an instance are part of the history var changesGR = new GlideRecord("sys_sync_change"); changesGR.addQuery("instance", current.instance); changesGR.addQuery("state", "queued"); changesGR.query(); while (changesGR.next()) { changesGR.setValue("state", "pending_push"); changesGR.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-09-21 07:47:28</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2a4ba45183701210c6695855eeaad3ba</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update changes on local push delete</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Now Utils" source="x_938076_now_utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Now Utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules_2a4ba45183701210c6695855eeaad3ba</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-09-21 07:47:28</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_rules> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2a4ba45183701210c6695855eeaad3ba"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update changes on local push delete
